events.message: We have received the application from the candidate for the software engineer position and all initial documents are in order.
The candidate's profile was reviewed and categorized under the engineering roles based on skills in software development and DevOps experience.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the candidate's application process and coordinate further screening for the DevOps engineering role.
Initial screening call was conducted to discuss the candidate's experience with software engineering and their familiarity with the required DevOps tools.
Candidate confirmed availability for a technical interview next week and expressed enthusiasm about working on the engineering team.
Technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-05-10 with the senior engineering panel to assess coding skills and system design knowledge.
